attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
#LOOKER

Go for this LOOKER.
and it is AMGEEEEE!!!

Very LOW KM, Full service history, Panoramic sunroof, 18” Sporty wheels, Reverse camera, Paddle shift, Front & rear park distance control, LED high performance headlights, Diamond grill, Dynamic select, Bluetooth, Cruise control, Carbon interior trim, Leather/Alcantara interior with red stitching, Auto start/stop, Electric folding mirrors & more.

Prices EXCLUDE Admin, License & Registration Fees.
TRADE INS MAY AFFECT PRICE.
E&OE, T's & C's Apply!

OPTIONAL ADD ons:
Nationwide delivery, Warranty, Service plan, Tracking, Sometimes Mags, Smash & Grab protect, VPS, Etc…

attributes.description:
Hit the streets and go find your fun!

Introducing the Toyota Urban Cruiser. This compact SUV puts the fun into chasing the sun, with its economical 1.5-litre, four-cylinder petrol engine. The Urban Cruiser is ready to find new frontiers - with you seated behind the wheel.

Turn heads as you drive by and be the envy of the all in your new car. All trade ins are welcomed. In house finance is available. Nationwide delivery can be arranged.

attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient
